backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, user profiles, lease listings, and lease requests with create/update logic and access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a routing-related feature to affected frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files including routing, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the root React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router with hash-based routing, global layout, theme provider, and profile modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Badge showing the logged-in user's display name if authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity flow with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard component displaying a sign‑in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Incomi: Displays incoming lease requests for an owner with status updates, loading states, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseO: Modal dialog for creating or editing lease listings with form validation for UUIDs and split ratios.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OwnerO: Shows the owner's lease listings with options to create, edit, or archive entries and includes loading and empty views.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with top navigation, footer, and page content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with links, branding, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/leases/EmptyStat: Reusable component that shows a centered empty-state message with icon and description.
frontend/src/components/leases/LeaseList: Card UI for displaying lease listing details with location, stats, status, and link to details page.
frontend/src/components/marketing/GetUni: Marketing section promoting the Unity Network mobile app with store links and branding.
frontend/src/components/media/YouTubeSho: Renders a grid of YouTube Shorts instructional videos using static IDs and card layout. Includes channel link and descriptive headers.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Implements the top navigation bar with links, authentication controls, and a mobile slide-out menu. Uses TanStack router navigation and responsive design.
frontend/src/components/requests/SubmitL: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit lease requests with a message. Shows a sign-in prompt when unauthenticated and handles request submission state.
frontend/src/components/requests/TenantR: Displays the user's submitted lease requests in a table with status badges. Supports loading skeletons and shows an empty state when no requests exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing on identity changes. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity state to expose auth info, login/logout, and formatted principal strings. Determines whether the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, managing login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup. Exposes identity state and status flags to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseListings.ts: Fetches active and owner-specific lease listings via the actor using React Query. Queries are enabled only when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseRequests.ts: Handles submitting lease requests and fetching tenant/owner requests via actor. Also supports updating request status with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerDashboard.ts: Defines mutations for creating, updating, and archiving lease listings through the actor. Each mutation invalidates relevant listing queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile via the actor. Exposes loading states and invalidates cached profile data on save.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Authenticated dashboard with tabs for offers, incoming requests, and user requests plus YouTube shorts section.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains workflow for using ULO lease codes with step cards, info sections, and external UnityNodes link.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, feature cards, and link to browse lease listings.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a specific lease listing with loading states, not-found handling, and request form.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseListingsPage.tsx: Lists active lease listings with sorting, loading skeletons, and empty state fallback.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with message and button linking back to home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear specific params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, goals, architectural notes, constraints, known issues, and existing feature records for an ICP‑hosted leasing site.
